name: DivineLiving
0:
”Alexa, open divine living”
”what is divinity soup?”
”what is a plant diet?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: divine living
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Explore the Divine Living where Sheila Brown, an author, speaker, and educator, shares a wealth of knowledge through healthy recipes and recorded tips. 

Divine Living, as envisioned by Sheila Brown, is about achieving optimal physical well-being, nurturing a sound mind, and attaining spiritual balance at any age. Through practices like prayer, meditation, juicing, fasting, positive thoughts, affirmations, physical activity, and a plant-based diet, you can embrace Divine Living and enhance your overall well-being.

Get Audio Recorded Daily Tips + Ask A Question + Ask about healthy recipes! 

Example Questions to Ask:

+ Is there a healthy way to detox?
+ Tell about the 3-day Reboot?
+ What is Divinity Soup?
+ Will I lose weight eating Divinity Soup?
+ What is Sheila Brown's Divine Meals?
+ Do you have a lentil soup recipe?
+ Give me a berry recipe!
+ Who is Sheila Brown?




Listen to inspirational and educational audio-recorded tips!

Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. Please call your doctor to receive medical advice.

To learn more about Divine Living tools and programs visit sheilabrownspeaks.com.

Support Email: info@sheilabrownspeaks.com
priv:
